general.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
general.author: Ralph Marston

general.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
general.author: Zig Ziglar

general.quote: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
general.author: Salvador Dali

general.quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
general.author: Epictetus

general.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
general.author: May Angelou

general.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
general.author: Robert H. Schuller

general.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
general.author: Ayn Rand

general.quote: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did.
general.author: John Burroughs

general.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
general.author: Dennis P. Kimbro

general.quote: Even if you’re on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.
general.author: Will Rogers

general.quote: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
general.author: Ray Kroc

general.quote: Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees all others.
general.author: Winston Churchill

general.quote: The great thing in this world is not so much where you stand, as in what direction you are moving.
general.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

general.quote: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
general.author: Carl Bard

general.quote: Speak less than you know; have more than you show.
general.author: William Shakespeare

general.quote: Education costs money. But then so does ignorance.
general.author: Sir Claus Moser

general.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
general.author: Lao Tzu

general.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
general.author: John Wooden

general.quote: Defeat is not bitter unless you swallow it.
general.author: Joe Clark

general.quote: An obstacle is often a stepping stone.
general.author: Prescott

general.quote: Don’t worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don’t even try.
general.author: Jack Canfield

general.quote: Live each day as if your life had just begun.
general.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

general.quote: The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential, these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Set your goals high and don’t stop until you get there.
general.author: Bo Jackson

general.quote: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
general.author: Bertrand Russell

general.quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow’s reality.
general.author: Malala Yousafzai

general.quote: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
general.author: Earl Nightingale

general.quote: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
general.author: Thomas Jefferson

general.quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
general.author: John Muir

general.quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone’s cloud.
general.author: Maya Angelou

general.quote: I dwell in possibility.
general.author: Emily Dickinson

general.quote: A No. 2 pencil and a dream can take you anywhere.
general.author: Joyce Meyer

general.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
general.author: Mahatma Gandhi

general.quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
general.author: Joseph Campbell

general.quote: Each day provides its own gifts.
general.author: Marcus Aurelius

general.quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
general.author: Rob Siltanen

general.quote: Imagine your life is perfect in every respect; what would it look like?
general.author: Brian Tracy

general.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
general.author: Walt Disney

general.quote: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
general.author: Amelia Barr

general.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
general.author: George Addair

general.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
general.author: Winston Churchill

general.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
general.author: C.S. Lewis

general.quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
general.author: Roy T. Bennett

general.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
general.author: Nelson Mandela

general.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
general.author: Paulo Coelho

general.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down. It’s whether you get up.
general.author: Vince Lombardi

general.quote: Your true success in life begins only when you make the commitment to become excellent at what you do.
general.author: Brian Tracy

general.quote: If you believe it will work out, you’ll see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles.
general.author: Wayne Dyer

general.quote: Your mental and physical health come first. Everything else is secondary.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: Less is almost always more. Simplicity is almost always the answer.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: You have to be lucky to be successful, but luck can be engineered.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: It all starts and ends in the mind. The most crucial skill is how you think.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: People suck. But if you’re kind, you’ll get the best out of even the worst.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: Perfection only exists in the mind. It’s not real. Imagine, create, improve.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: The world doesn’t need more noise. Don’t complain. Set an example.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: Struggle is a part of life. Learning to struggle well is a reward in itself.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: Your attention is the most important asset you have. Be deliberate with it.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: The goal of an ideal partner isn’t to complete you. It’s to augment you.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: Who you let into your life is a vital decision. Don’t leave it up to chance.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: The purpose of life isn’t to do or to accomplish. It’s to merely experience.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: Everything is approximate. Don’t aim to be right. Aim to be less wrong.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: It’s better to not have an opinion than to blindly follow someone else’s.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: For the world to put you down, it first needs you to give it permission.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: The more things you care about, the less meaningful caring becomes.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: Be kind to yourself in the face of failures. They really don’t define you.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: Don’t take too much pride in your accomplishments. They’re not all yours.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: Life is short. Don’t tolerate bullsh*t. Don’t wait until it’s too late.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: It’s true that some people have more innate talent. But talent isn’t enough.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: There is no such thing as fairness, and dwelling on it creates despair.
general.author: Zat Rana

general.quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
general.author: John Wooden

general.quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.
general.author: Jim Rohn

general.quote: Trust because you are willing to accept the risk, not because it’s safe or certain.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
general.author: Walt Disney

general.quote: Good things come to people who wait, but better things come to those who go out and get them.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: If you do what you always did, you will get what you always got.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
general.author: Winston Churchill

general.quote: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was ending, he turned into a butterfly.
general.author: Proverb

general.quote: Successful entrepreneurs are givers and not takers of positive energy.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
general.author: Dr. Seuss

general.quote: Whenever you see a successful person you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
general.author: Vaibhav Shah

general.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
general.author: John D. Rockefeller

general.quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
general.author: Bruce Feirstein

general.quote: Don’t raise your voice, improve your argument.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
general.author: Oscar Wilde

general.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
general.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

general.quote: What’s the point of being alive if you don’t at least try to do something remarkable.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
general.author: Lolly Daskal

general.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
general.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

general.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
general.author: George Eliot

general.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
general.author: Robert Frost

general.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.
general.author: Confucius

general.quote: We are still masters of our fate. We are still captains of our souls.
general.author: Winston Churchill

general.quote: The best way out is always through.
general.author: Robert Frost

general.quote: Hope is like the sun, which, as we journey toward it, casts the shadow of our burden behind us.
general.author: Samuel Smiles

general.quote: Enthusiasm is the energy and force that builds literal momentum of the human soul and mind.
general.author: Bryant McGill

general.quote: Sometimes thinking too much can destroy your momentum.
general.author: Tom Watson

general.quote: Work spares us from three evils: boredom, vice, and need.
general.author: Voltaire

general.quote: Fortune favors the brave.
general.author: Publius Terence

general.quote: Strong lives are motivated by dynamic purposes.
general.author: Kenneth Hildebrand

general.quote: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
general.author: Benjamin Franklin

general.quote: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.
general.author: Latin Proverb

general.quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
general.author: Roger Staubach

general.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
general.author: Les Brown

general.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
general.author: Joshua J. Marine

general.quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
general.author: Leonardo da Vinci

general.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
general.author: Arthur Ashe

general.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
general.author: Dalai Lama

general.quote: If you do what you’ve always done, you’ll get what you’ve always gotten.
general.author: Tony Robbins

general.quote: If you are offered a seat on a rocket ship, don’t ask what seat! Just get on.
general.author: Sheryl Sandberg

general.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
general.author: Ayn Rand

general.quote: Always work hard. Intensity clarifies. It creates not only momentum, but also the pressure you need to feel either friction, or fulfillment.
general.author: Marcus Buckingham

general.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act but a habit.
general.author: Aristotle

general.quote: Take calculated risks. That is quite different from being rash.
general.author: George S. Patton

general.quote: In every difficult situation is potential value. Believe this, then begin looking for it.
general.author: Norman Vincent Peale

general.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
general.author: Henry Ford

general.quote: Accept responsibly for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
general.author: Les Brown

general.quote: You cannot plough a field by turning it over in your mind.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: The world is wide, and I will not waste my life in friction when it could be turned into momentum.
general.author: Frances E. Willard

general.quote: Believe with all of your heart that you will do what you were made to do.
general.author: Orison Swett Marden

general.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
general.author: William B. Sprague

general.quote: If you have the guts to keep making mistakes, your wisdom and intelligence leap forward with huge momentum.
general.author: Holly Near

general.quote: Good things come to those who wait but greater things come to those who get off their ass and do anything to make it happen.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: Ask and it will be given to you; search and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.
general.author: Jesus

general.quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing and that is why we recommend it daily.
general.author: Zig Ziglar

general.quote: I can, therefore I am.
general.author: Simone Weil

general.quote: I’ve found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances. Be more active. Show up more often.
general.author: Brian Tracy

general.quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.
general.author: George S. Patton

general.quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself.
general.author: Albert Camus

general.quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
general.author: Mark Caine

general.quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
general.author: Amelia Earhart

general.quote: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.
general.author: William James

general.quote: Leap, and the net will appear.
general.author: John Burroughs

general.quote: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed – there’s so little competition.
general.author: Elbert Hubbard

general.quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
general.author: Napoleon Hill

general.quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
general.author: John F. Kennedy

general.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
general.author: Aristotle

general.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
general.author: Benjamin Franklin

general.quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
general.author: Jim Rohn

general.quote: Once you choose hope, anything's possible.
general.author: Christopher Reeve

general.quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
general.author: Winston Churchill

general.quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
general.author: Warren Buffett

general.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
general.author: Dr. Seuss

general.quote: Life is short, and it is here to be lived.
general.author: Kate Winslet

general.quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backward...This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
general.author: Pablo Picasso

general.quote: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
general.author: Jim Rohn

general.quote: Rarely have I seen a situation where doing less than the other guy is a good strategy.
general.author: Jimmy Spithill

general.quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
general.author: Barack Obama

general.quote: If you love what you do and are willing to do what it takes, it's within your reach.
general.author: Steve Wozniak

general.quote: In my experience, there is only one motivation, and that is desire. No reasons or principle contain it or stand against it.
general.author: Jane Smiley

general.quote: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it.
general.author: Charles F. Kettering

general.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
general.author: Bruce Lee

general.quote: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you.
general.author: Deepak Chopra

general.quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
general.author: George Bernard Shaw

general.quote: I don't want to get to the end of my life and find that I lived just the length of it. I want to have lived the width of it as well.
general.author: Diane Ackerman

general.quote: As we look ahead into the next century, leaders will be those who empower others.
general.author: Bill Gates

general.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
general.author: Vidal Sassoon

general.quote: It’s not what you look at that matters, it’s what you see.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
general.author: Colin R. Davis

general.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
general.author: Maya Angelou

general.quote: A real entrepreneur is somebody who has no safety net underneath them.
general.author: Henry Kravis

general.quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
general.author: Ralph Nader

general.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: If you genuinely want something, don’t wait for it — teach yourself to be impatient.
general.author: Gurbaksh Chahal

general.quote: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
general.author: Robert Kiyosaki

general.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
general.author: Jim Ryun

general.quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.
general.author: Dale Carnegie

general.quote: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above it.
general.author: Washington Irving

general.quote: Knowledge is being aware of what you can do. Wisdom is knowing when not to do it.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: You can do anything, but not everything.
general.author: Anonymous

general.quote: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
general.author: Coco Chanel

general.quote: There are two types of people who will tell you that you cannot make a difference in this world: those who are afraid to try and those who are afraid you will succeed.
general.author: Ray Goforth

general.quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
general.author: Albert Einstein

general.quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
general.author: Swami Vivekananda

general.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
general.author: Mae West

general.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
general.author: Chris Grosser

general.quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don't take.
general.author: Wayne Gretzky

general.quote: The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.
general.author: Dolly Parton

general.quote: The longer I live, the more beautiful life becomes.
general.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

general.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
general.author: Robert Collier

general.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
general.author: John Wooden

general.quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination, and hard work.
general.author: Colin Powell

general.quote: If you always do what interests you, at least one person is pleased.
general.author: Katharine Hepburn

general.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor...Explore. Dream. Discover.
general.author: Mark Twain

general.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
general.author: John D. Rockefeller

general.quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
general.author: Pablo Picasso

general.quote: Though no one can go back and make a brand-new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand-new ending.
general.author: Carl Bard

general.quote: We become what we think about most of the time, and that's the strangest secret.
general.author: Earl Nightingale

general.quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk...In a world that's changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
general.author: Mark Zuckerberg

general.quote: Don't worry about failure; you only have to be right once.
general.author: Drew Houston

general.quote: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
general.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

general.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you can never see the shadow.
general.author: Helen Keller

general.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
general.author: Vidal Sassoon

general.quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
general.author: Oprah Winfrey

general.quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
general.author: Michael John Bobak

general.quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
general.author: Mark Caine

general.quote: I avoid looking forward or backward, and try to keep looking upward.
general.author: Charlotte Bronte

general.quote: One of the greatest diseases is to be nobody to anybody.
general.author: Mother Teresa

general.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
general.author: Steve Jobs

general.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into visible.
general.author: Tony Robbins

general.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
general.author: Emelia Earhart

general.quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
general.author: Ernest Hemingway

general.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
general.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: New Year's Day is every man's birthday.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is the first blank page of a 365-page book. Write a good one.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: Celebrate endings—for they precede new beginnings.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Enjoy the early May bank holiday to refresh your spirit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: May's first Monday brings rest and renewal.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Take time off and let the joy of May fill your heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A bank holiday is a reminder to pause and appreciate life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Refresh your soul on this bright May morning.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Spring Bank Holiday is a celebration of renewal.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Let the freshness of spring fill you with hope.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Celebrate life’s rebirth on this special day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A day to enjoy the vibrant energy of spring.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Renew yourself this bank holiday with joy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Summer Bank Holiday is a time for rest and joy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Savor the last warm days of summer.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Take a break and let the summer sun inspire you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Relax and relish the golden moments of summer.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: May your summer break bring you peace and happiness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Christmas isn't a season. It's a feeling.
quotes.author: Edna Ferber

quotes.quote: Peace on earth will come to stay when we live Christmas every day.
quotes.author: Helen Steiner Rice

quotes.quote: Christmas waves a magic wand over the world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: The best way to spread Christmas cheer is singing loud for all to hear.
quotes.author: Elf (Movie)

quotes.quote: Christmas is the spirit of giving without expecting anything in return.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Boxing Day is a time to relax and reflect on the past year.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: May the day after Christmas bring warmth and togetherness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Celebrate Boxing Day with gratitude and kindness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Take a moment on Boxing Day to appreciate life's blessings.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Boxing Day reminds us to share and care.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Easter is a time of renewal and hope.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Celebrate the miracle of Easter and new beginnings.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Let the joy of Easter fill your heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Easter reminds us that hope can rise again.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: May your Easter be filled with love and miracles.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Ascension Day marks a journey upward.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Let Ascension Day inspire you to rise above.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Reflect on growth and elevation on this special day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: May your spirit soar on Ascension Day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Celebrate the upward journey of life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Pentecost celebrates the arrival of the Spirit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: May the fire of Pentecost ignite your passion.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Celebrate the gift of inspiration on Pentecost.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Pentecost: A day of unity and divine guidance.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Let the blessings of Pentecost fill your life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Ramadan is a time for reflection and spiritual growth.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: May the holy month of Ramadan bring you peace.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Ramadan teaches us patience, compassion, and self-discipline.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Let Ramadan renew your spirit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Wishing you a blessed and peaceful Ramadan.
